bibl.title: with Contributions by Donald KING and Michael RYDER, Qasr Ibrim: The Textiles from the Cathedral Cemetery.
bibl.note: figg. et 10 pll. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-0-85698-199-9. £35.

Foreword (by Nettie K. ADAMS). - Introduction. - The Excavations. - Catalogues. - Dye testing on samples from Qasr Ibrim. - Radiocarbon dating of Qasr Ibrim textiles [c. AD 690-985 - 1015-1160]. - Two wool rugs from the West Tower burials (by D.K.). - The kinds of wool in the textiles from Qasr Ibrim (by M.R.). - Bibliography.
bibl.seg: GRACE CROWFOOT Elisabeth, with Contributions by Donald KING and Michael RYDER, Qasr Ibrim: The Textiles from the Cathedral Cemetery. (Excavation Memoirs. 96.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2011, 4°, viii-44 pll., figg. et 10 pll. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-0-85698-199-9. £35.

Foreword (by Nettie K. ADAMS). - Introduction. - The Excavations. - Catalogues. - Dye testing on samples from Qasr Ibrim. - Radiocarbon dating of Qasr Ibrim textiles [c. AD 690-985 - 1015-1160]. - Two wool rugs from the West Tower burials (by D.K.). - The kinds of wool in the textiles from Qasr Ibrim (by M.R.). - Bibliography.
